short_description: [Professional Rechargeable Nail Lamp] Equipped with 15600mAh large-capacity battery, our cordless nail lamp works for 10 hours continuously. The 25W rapid recharge enables the nail lamp to be fully recharged in 2 hours. You can take our portable nail dryer to anywhere, no mess with wire, super convenience to use.

[Smart Sensor and Adjustable 4 Timers] Built-in infrared sensor lights, the UV LED nail lamp automatically turns on when you place your hand or foot inside, and turns off when you take it out. The reflective mirrored base is magnetic and detaches for easy cleaning the inside. With large opening, whole hand or foot can be putting in without worrying about messing up your polishes.

[What You Get] Our Rechargeable UV LED nail lamp come with 1 x adapter, 1 x user manual, worry-free lifetime warranty, and friendly customer service. short_description: FROM MELODYSUSIE RECHARGEABLE FULL-HAND NAIL LAMP COLLECTION: This 48W P-Plus20F UV LED Cordless Nail Lamp features a compact design with built-in physical UV protection. It keeps your workspace organized for a hassle-free nail art experience while protecting your hands and skin from excessive UV exposure. Designed to effectively prevent potential harm caused by unnecessary UV light—such as skin aging—it offers a safe, reliable, and comfortable nail experience. Available in three vibrant colors to brighten up your nail table

RAPID & EFFICIENT CURING FOR ALL SOFT GELS: Equipped with 20 upgraded light beads, this nail lamp ensures fast and efficient curing for all soft gels. It’s especially suitable for quick-curing gel polishes from other nail brands such as Jodsone, Londontown, and Modelones. The lamp also works exceptionally well for rhinestone glue, solid nail glue gel, and liner gel polish, making it a dreamy companion for every nail-curing and design session.

MAIN FEATURES: The P-Plus20F nail lamp is powered by a 7800mAh built-in battery, offering 2–4 hours of use on a full charge. Its 240° rotatable panel ensures a customized experience for hands and feet of different lengths and widths. The lightweight and compact design makes it perfect for on-the-go manicures. It also features 2 timer settings (35s/65s) to adjust curing times for various nail design needs. Whether you’re a beginner or a professional nail artist, at home or on the go, this lamp is your perfect companion with its long-lasting battery, compact size, and portable design. Enjoy flawless, flexible nail creation with MelodySusie anytime, anywhere.

WARRANTY & CUSTOMER SUPPORT: At MelodySusie, your satisfaction is our top priority. We proudly stand behind the quality and performance of our products. If you encounter any issues or defects, our customer support team is always ready to help with repair, replacement, or troubleshooting solutions. Simply reach out to us through your Amazon order page, and we’ll make it right. We aim to make you shop with confidence and know we’ve got you covered.

TRUST IN A PROFESSIONAL BRAND: MelodySusie, founded in 2009, a trusted nail tool brand with over a decade of history, is dedicated to developing high-quality, innovative nail products. We prioritize our customers’ needs and experiences, offering timely, worry-free support and a reliable warranty at all times
